contrastive_data_name.description: Name of contrastive data artifact stored in W&B.

contrastive_data_version.description: Version of contrastive data artifact stored in W&B.

misconception_data_name.description: Name of misconception data artifact stored in W&B.

misconception_data_version.description: Version of misconception data artifact stored in W&B.

num_folds.description: Number of folds to use for cross-validation. Default is 5.

batch_size.description: Batch size for training. Default is 16.

num_workers.description: Number of workers to use for data loading. Default is 4.
